version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 2003 and given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Arrows -> White and black arrows

emoji_net_data.name: up arrow

bn:00113406a: Being or moving higher in position or greater in some value; being above a former position or level

bn:00107598a: Situated in or facing or moving toward or coming from the north

bn:00113407a: Extending or moving toward a higher place
Moving up, directed toward a higher place.

bn:00111992a: Situated at the top or highest position

bn:13637033v: To turn or move toward the north.

bn:00029051n: North is a noun, adjective, or adverb indicating direction or geography.
One of the four cardinal directions
The cardinal compass point that is at 0 or 360 degrees

bn:00005896n: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

apple_vendor_description: Apple's up arrow emoji is a clean, bold symbol rendered in a striking shade of blue, featuring a noticeable 3D effect with subtle highlights that suggest a glossy surface. Its sharp, distinct point and smooth, rounded base are classic Apple design cues, conveying a strong sense of direction, progress, and ascent. This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to indicate moving upwards, increasing in value, or indicating a positive trend in conversations.
